From: cantera@yahoogroups.com [mailto:cantera@yahoogr=
oups.com] On Behalf Of Michele Vascellari
Sent: Friday, April 11, 2008 4:37=

To: cantera@yahoogroups.com
Subject: Re: [cantera] compiling error on L=
inux

The problem is related to gcc version 4.3, since in this version the =
C++ header dependencies have been cleaned up.

I solved the problem adding =
the standard C++ header, where I found message errors.

Michele



Il giorn=
